cast.name: 考德·欧威尔斯特利特 Chord Overstreet
Alex Rose Wiesel Alex Rose Wiesel
布莱恩·利利斯 Bryan Lillis
Frederick Keith Johnson Frederick Keith Johnson
阿什丽·格林尼 Ashley Greene
加布里埃尔·安瓦尔 Gabrielle Anwar

introduction: 凯南·鲁兹饰演一位曲棍球运动员，在父亲过世后大受打击，而阿什丽·格林尼饰演曲棍球教练的女儿帮助他找回勇气。In shock and denial over his Marine father's death in battle, star Lacrosse player Conor Sullivan, always a maverick and a hothead, starts acting out in self-destructive ways that have his mom, Claire, at her wit's end. But arduous training in a wilderness Lacrosse camp under the tutelage of his dad's old combat buddy, Sgt. Major Duke Wayne, opens Conor's eyes to the true meaning of maturity, sportsmanship and manhood...Twilight s Kellan Lutz and Ashley Greene re-team in this story of young love and the values that can be learned through a shared passion for sport. In shock and denial over his Marine father s death in combat, high school lacrosse star Conor Sullivan (Kellan Lutz) starts acting out in self destructive ways until he s kicked off the team and sent to a wilderness lacrosse camp run by his dad s combat buddy (Adam Beach). Strengthened by the support and understanding of his newfound love (Ashley Greene) , and through a deep understanding of the game and its Native American roots, he opens his eyes to the true meaning of sportsmanship, love, and life.
